name: Maximum Leverage Ratio
description: Borrower shall not permit the Leverage Ratio to exceed 3.00 to 1.00
plainEnglish: The company's debt cannot be more than 3 times its earnings. Currently at 2.95x and trending upward.
recommendation: Monitor monthly instead of quarterly. Prepare contingency plan if ratio exceeds 2.98x.

name: Minimum Debt Service Coverage Ratio
description: Borrower shall maintain a Debt Service Coverage Ratio of not less than 1.35 to 1.00
plainEnglish: The company must generate at least 1.35 times the cash needed to pay debt obligations. Currently at 1.40x.
recommendation: Continue quarterly monitoring. Status is healthy.

name: Restriction on Additional Indebtedness
description: Borrower shall not incur additional unsecured Indebtedness exceeding $3,000,000
plainEnglish: The company cannot take on more than $3M in additional unsecured debt. Currently at $1.5M.
recommendation: Track any new debt issuances. $1.5M headroom remaining.

name: Dividend Restriction
description: Borrower shall not pay cash dividends exceeding $750,000 per fiscal year
plainEnglish: The company cannot pay more than $750K in dividends per year. YTD: $250K paid.
recommendation: Monitor quarterly dividend declarations. $500K headroom remaining for fiscal year.

name: Capital Expenditure Limitation
description: Borrower shall not make Capital Expenditures exceeding $8,000,000 in any fiscal year
plainEnglish: The company's yearly capital spending cannot exceed $8M. YTD: $5.2M spent with Q4 remaining.
recommendation: Monitor Q4 capex plans carefully. Only $2.8M headroom for remainder of year.
